message.content:
You are a validator agent. Your job is to ensure the codebase has no broken code after the LOOKSMAXX to PROJECT CASSANOVA rename.

Run these checks in the looksmaxx-app directory:

1. TypeScript type checking: `npx tsc --noEmit`
2. ESLint: `npm run lint`

Report:
- Any TypeScript errors (not warnings)
- Any ESLint errors (not warnings)
- Overall PASS/FAIL status

If there are errors, identify the specific files and line numbers that need fixing.

Working directory: /Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app

content.text: ## Validation Report: LOOKSMAXX to PROJECT CASSANOVA Rename ### TypeScript Type Checking **Status: PASS** No TypeScript errors detected. The `npx tsc --noEmit` command completed successfully with no output. --- ### ESLint Linting **Status: FAIL (4 Errors, 6 Warnings)** #### Errors (Must Fix) | File | Line | Error | |------|------|-------| | `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/app/checkout/cancel/page.tsx` | 9:11 | `'router'` is assigned a value but never used (`@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars`) | | `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/app/checkout/success/page.tsx` | 11:11 | `'router'` is assigned a value but never used (`@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars`) | | `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/app/checkout/success/page.tsx` | 29:29 | Unexpected `any`. Specify a different type (`@typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any`) | | `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/app/checkout/success/page.tsx` | 86:36 | Unescaped apostrophe `'` - should use `'` (`react/no-unescaped-entities`) | #### Warnings (Non-blocking) | File | Line | Warning | |------|------|---------| | `src/components/LandmarkAnalysisTool.tsx` | 386:6 | Missing dependency in useCallback | | `src/components/results/cards/AnalysisHistoryCard.tsx` | 64:13 | Using `` instead of Next.js `` | | `src/components/results/modals/UserProfileModal.tsx` | 108:21 | Using `` instead of Next.js `` | | `src/components/results/tabs/LeaderboardTab.tsx` | 258:29 | Using `` instead of Next.js `` | | `src/contexts/ResultsContext.tsx` | 921:6 | Missing dependencies in useCallback | | `src/contexts/ResultsContext.tsx` | 1124:7 | Missing dependency in useMemo | --- ### Overall Verdict: **FAIL** **Summary:** - **TypeScript**: PASS (0 errors) - **ESLint**: FAIL (4 errors, 6 warnings) **Files Requiring Fixes:** 1. `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/app/checkout/cancel/page.tsx` - Remove unused `router` variable 2. `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/app/checkout/success/page.tsx` - 3 issues: - Remove unused `router` variable (line 11) - Replace `any` type with specific type (line 29) - Escape apostrophe with `'` (line 86) **Recommendations:** 1. **Critical**: Fix the 4 ESLint errors in the checkout pages 2. **Medium**: The warnings are pre-existing issues unrelated to the rename and can be addressed separately
